Brisbane Geospatial Community of Practice

The Brisbane Geospatial Analysis Community of Practice (take the survey to choose a new name!) tries to make this process a bit less painful, by sharing our experiences, skills and tricks in a friendly and inclusive environment. üë©‚Äçüíª We run monthly skill sharing tutorial sessions where a member of the community teaches us something they have learned along the way.

This usually occurs on the last Thursday of each month. See upcoming events for the next session and check out our blog for previous sessions.
